 2007-09872007-06-14,  ,  ,  JUS, 
ActFederal Courts Act
PrecisOrder directing that COMMISSIONS do issue empowering 25 officers of the Courts Administration Service of the FEDERAL COURTS to administer oaths and to take and receive affidavits, declarations and affirmations within or outside of Canada, in respect of any matter before the Courts.
